over25.content: How will you split the contribution with your qualifying workers?
over25.triggerText: split the contribution with your qualifying workers
over25.helpText: Since you have 25 or more qualifying workers, you are required to pay the employer share.

under25.content: How will you split the contribution with your qualifying workers?
under25.triggerText: split the contribution with your qualifying workers
under25.helpText: Since you have fewer than 25 qualifying workers, you do not need to pay the employer share.
